1246660.name: Fantasy Grounds - Jan's Token Pack 06 - Heroes 2
1246660.description:
Jan's Token Pack 06 - Heroes 2

This token pack includes 20 heroic characters.
A male dark-elf ranger, and female dark-elf spellcaster for your dark adventures underground!
Demonborn tokens both male and female. Such as the warlock, rogue, and sorcerer. Will they try to hide their demonic ancestry or bravely face the world?
A Roman soldier. The legionary wields his gladius short sword and scutum shield. A version with and without helmet.
An old grey wizard with a beard, wielding his wooden staff. And many more tokens.
May you take them on great adventures!
Converted by:  
Jan Loos
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
